doc:
Wilton Taylor https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wilton_Taylor 0 Wilton Taylor (1869 – January 24, 1925) was an American stage and silent screen actor. He usually played gruff men of authority like wardens, judges or the police commissioner in Tod Browning's Outside the Law (1920). Of some other surviving silent he can be seen in Houdini's Terror Island (1920). Prior to entering films he spent some years on the stage and appeared as a police inspector in the original 1912 Broadway production of Within the Law starring Jane Cowl. Taylor died in January 1925. Wilton_Taylor ( 1869 – January_24 , 1925 ) was an_American_stage and silent_screen_actor . He usually played gruff_men of authority like wardens , judges or the_police_commissioner in Tod_Browning 's_Outside_the_Law_(_1920_) . Of some_other_surviving_silent he can_be_seen in Houdini 's_Terror_Island (_1920_) . Prior to entering_films he spent some_years on the_stage and appeared as a_police_inspector in the_original_1912_Broadway_production of_Within the_Law starring Jane_Cowl . Taylor died in January_1925 .
